In Fall 2025, the Perception, Action, and Development Lab celebrated [Aylin Luna](/people/aylin-luna.qmd) joining UCR as a doctoral student in the developmental area. Aylin worked as a research coordinator in the PADLAB for three years prior to transitioning into the graduate program.
